text: Andrew Steyn Kuhn (born ) is a South African rugby union player who last played for the in the Currie Cup and the in the Rugby Challenge in 2017. His regular position is prop or hooker. In 2018, Kuhn was listed in the South African Institute for Drug-Free Sport's Annual Report for a drugs violation; he tested positively for tamoxifen — classified as a prohibited hormone and metabolic modulator by the World Anti-Doping Agency — and was handed a two- year ban. ==References== Category:South African rugby union players Category:Living people Category:1997 births Category:People from Oudtshoorn Category:Rugby union props Category:Rugby union hookers Category:Doping cases in rugby union Category:Free State Cheetahs players
title: Andrew Kuhn
